name: Kalmund Capital
overview: The Munich-based Kalmund Capital is a private equity company now run by the second generation of the Kalmund Family. Their three business areas are: pre-market capital increases for fast-growing technology companies such as in the case of CAVI, capital increases for companies listed on the stock exchange (small and mid caps) as well as restructuring capital increases for companies listed on the stock exchange. They invest a fixed percentage of their profits in education for children and young people through the family-run non-profit GmbH “Kalmund for Kids”.
